overview:
As Chief Executive Officer at Inadco, James N. Walker is responsible for setting the overall strategy and direction for the company. As a pioneer in performance-based advertising, James brings a strong background in building and leading teams to develop innovative advertising solutions.

Before founding Inadco, James served as Vice President of Syndication at Connexus Corporation (now Epic Media Group). Epic Media Group is one of the largest online advertising companies in the world. Prior to that, James served as part of the founding team and Vice President of Sales at Netblue. Netblue was one of the first performance-based advertising companies to reach $100MM+ in annual revenue.
